data.message: Fix Knowledge Graph hydration, state management, and UX bugs: Fixed SSR/hydration risk by moving sessionStorage to useEffect, fixed effect dependencies, added reactive URL topic handling, fixed topic indicator drift with separate displayedTopic state, fixed reset count flicker, added click-to-focus for existing nodes. Commit: 0b422513
data.task: Fix Knowledge Graph hydration, state management, and UX bugs
data.outcome: Fixed SSR/hydration risk by moving sessionStorage to useEffect, fixed effect dependencies, added reactive URL topic handling, fixed topic indicator drift with separate displayedTopic state, fixed reset count flicker, added click-to-focus for existing nodes. Commit: 0b422513
